Sentencas: The present work deals with pre-reforming of logistic hydrocarbon fuel (jet fuel) as a part of an integrated approach to developing an on-board fuel reformer for use in a micro-solid-oxide fuel cell system.
Titulo: Steam reforming of liquid hydrocarbon fuels for micro-fuel cells. Pre-reforming of model jet fuels over supported metal catalysts

Sentencas: The purpose of doing pre-reforming is to ensure carbon-free reformulation of JP-8 jet fuel into hydrogen and carbon monoxide for use in a micro-solid-oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Steam reforming of liquid hydrocarbon fuels for micro-fuel cells. Pre-reforming of model jet fuels over supported metal catalysts

Sentencas: Several model jet fuels have been tested for the pre-reforming at low temperature (450-550 degrees C) in a lab-scale reforming reactor.
Titulo: Steam reforming of liquid hydrocarbon fuels for micro-fuel cells. Pre-reforming of model jet fuels over supported metal catalysts

Sentencas: Proper temperature control and pre-mixing of feed fuels and steam have been found to be important for the prevention of coke formation prior to pre-reforming.
Titulo: Steam reforming of liquid hydrocarbon fuels for micro-fuel cells. Pre-reforming of model jet fuels over supported metal catalysts

Sentencas: Both noble metal and base-metal catalysts have been prepared and tested.
Titulo: Steam reforming of liquid hydrocarbon fuels for micro-fuel cells. Pre-reforming of model jet fuels over supported metal catalysts

Sentencas: As compared with an Al2O3-supported Ni catalyst, supported Rh catalysts show not only high activity but also high resistance to deactivation due to carbon formation.
Titulo: Steam reforming of liquid hydrocarbon fuels for micro-fuel cells. Pre-reforming of model jet fuels over supported metal catalysts

Sentencas: Removal of residual Cl- from Rh/CeO2-Al2O3 improves the metal dispersion and the pre-reforming activity.
Titulo: Steam reforming of liquid hydrocarbon fuels for micro-fuel cells. Pre-reforming of model jet fuels over supported metal catalysts

Sentencas: The reformates from the current pre-reformer contain mainly CH4, CO, H-2, in which CH, can be further converted to H-2 and CO by subsequent main-reforming.
Titulo: Steam reforming of liquid hydrocarbon fuels for micro-fuel cells. Pre-reforming of model jet fuels over supported metal catalysts
